title: Why did Hunter x Hunter start sucking so much? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well it never sucked, let’s get that out of the way. The reason it seems bad is that it’s first arc is the worst in the series. The Hunter Exam and Zoldyck Family arcs are probably 7/10 or 6/10s. That’s above average. It seems bad because every other arc is so freakin’ good. Hunter Exam- 7/10- Had some really interesting moments. It had some great moments, like Killua taking out the heart of the mass murder in the tower and Gon and Killua trying to take the ball from Netero; However, the pacing was bad, and in the anime it didn’t give a great explanation of why Gon wanted to be a hunter.  Zoldyck Family- 6/10- My least favorite arc. It had some cool moments, and it really expanded on Killua, but it really didn’t mean to much. There weren’t any super memorable moments either. Even so, it was an above average arc.  Heaven's arena- 8.5/10- I loved this arc. It introduced us to nen, one of the best power systems in anime. Plus it gave us some great fights, like Gon vs. Hisoka and Hisoka vs. Kastro. The learning about nen and the power it holds is just amazing.  Yorknew Arc- 10/10- The 2nd best arc is the series. It is chalk full of super amazing moments, and it also introduces some of the coolest characters in the series like the Phantom Troup. Chrollo is a 10/10 villain. Kurapika vs. Uvogin, Silva and Zeno vs. Chrollo, and Uvogin vs. the Shadow Beasts are some of the best fights in the series. Chrollo directing the Phantom Troup like the conductor of a symphony is probably my 2nd or 3rd favorite moment in the series.  Greed Island- 8.5/10- Expanded even more on nen. The game against Razor was amazing. Just the whole idea of a card game was fantastic. All of the cards were written out, and the complexity and variety was great. We finally got to see Gon’s hatsu, and Hisoka was in the arc; However, it had to worst villain in the series. Chimera Ant Arc- 10/10- I don’t even have to say anything. It’s the best arc in all of anime.  Election Arc- 9/10- Pariston is another 10/10 antagonist which is really impressive considering he’s the fourth best villain in the series. Although you could argue that Hisoka isn’t an antagonist. Leorio punching Ging was the most satisfying punch I’ve ever seen. Hisoka vs. Gotoh was super cool, but I wasn’t a fan of the Alluka plot line. That’s why it’s a 9 instead of a 10.  So the reason it seems that Hunter x Hunter starts off badly, is that it does. However, it’s only bad because the rest of the series is so good. If the rest of the series was average, the early arcs would seem average too.
Never. It never sucked. I wish that I could say the same about the person who asked this question.
